title: 监狱不能使用
author: qq307198081
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-27 11:12 编辑 

输入关玩家监狱后崩服。
重启后报错

[15:46:53] [Server thread/INFO]: [HolographicDisplays] dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/holographic-displays
[15:46:53] [Server thread/INFO]: Accepted EditSessionFactory of type net.coreprotect.worldedit.CoreProtectEditSessionFactory from net.coreprotect.worldedit
[15:46:53] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 10/WARN]: Exception in thread "Craft Scheduler Thread - 10" 
[15:46:53] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 10/WARN]: org.apache.commons.lang.UnhandledException: Plugin Essentials v2.13.1 generated an exception while executing task 78
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:56)

Caused by: while scanning a quoted scalar
 in 'reader', line 9, column 3:

found unexpected end of stream
 in 'reader', line 23, column 1:

        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.scanner.ScannerImpl.checkToken(ScannerImpl.java:226)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.parser.ParserImpl$ParseBlockMappingKey.produce(ParserImpl.java:558)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.parser.ParserImpl.peekEvent(ParserImpl.java:158)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.parser.ParserImpl.checkEvent(ParserImpl.java:143)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.composer.Composer.composeMappingNode(Composer.java:230)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.composer.Composer.composeNode(Composer.java:159)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.composer.Composer.composeMappingNode(Composer.java:237)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.composer.Composer.composeNode(Composer.java:159)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.composer.Composer.composeMappingNode(Composer.java:237)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.composer.Composer.composeNode(Composer.java:159)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.composer.Composer.composeDocument(Composer.java:122)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.composer.Composer.getSingleNode(Composer.java:105)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.constructor.BaseConstructor.getSingleData(BaseConstructor.java:120)
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml.loadFromReader(Yaml.java:481)

replies.author: qq307198081
replies.txt_content:
lxxy 发表于 2016-2-27 18:15
尝试删除ESS插件，重启一次，在安装ESS插件，在重启一次。

然后重新设置一个监狱点。 ...
几百人在线- -！这样做风险会不会很高 我有以前的备份文件有用吗？
